scripts.install: autogypi --init-gyp -p nbind -s iprivpg/wrapper/ipriv.cxx -s iprivpg/src/libipriv.cpp -s iprivpg/src/ipriv.cpp -s iprivpg/src/armor.* -s iprivpg/src/eng_rsaref.* -s iprivpg/src/i_stdlib.* -s iprivpg/src/keycard.* -s iprivpg/src/memfile.cpp -s iprivpg/src/packet.cpp -s iprivpg/src/radix64.cpp -s iprivpg/src/idea/idea.c -s iprivpg/src/md5/md5c.c -s iprivpg/src/rfc6234/sha256.c -s iprivpg/src/rsaref/rsa.c -s iprivpg/src/rsaref/r_stdlib.c -s iprivpg/src/rsaref/r_random.c -s iprivpg/src/rsaref/r_keygen.c -s iprivpg/src/rsaref/prime.c -s iprivpg/src/rsaref/nn.c -s iprivpg/src/rsaref/digit.c  && node-gyp configure build
